isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE AND FENDERS - 2000, 4000, 8000 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - 2000 SERIES SPLASH PANELS

svcsubproc.title: 2500 and 2600 Model Splash Panels (Original Hood) - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 39 for items in parentheses.

figure.caption: Figure 39. 2500 and 2600 Original Hood Splash Panel

step1.para: To remove passenger side hood/fender splash panel (Item 1), remove the push-in fasteners (Item 2) attaching it to the hood/fender assembly (Item 3). Remove the hood/fender splash panel.
Repeat procedure to remove the driver side hood/fender splash panel.
To remove passenger side splash guard panel ( Item 1, Figure 40), unhook the 3 springs ( Item 2, Figure 40) attaching it at the bottom to the chassis.

figure.caption: Figure 40. 2500 and 2600 Original Hood Splash Guard Panel

step1.para: Lift the splash guard panel hanger rod ( Item 1, Figure 41) out of the front bracket ( Item 2, Figure 41), then pull it out of the rear bracket ( Item 3, Figure 41). Remove the splash guard panel ( Item 4, Figure 41), passenger side shown.

figure.caption: Figure 41. 2500 and 2600 Original Hood Splash Guard Panel

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove the driver side splash guard panel.

svcsubproc.title: 2500 and 2600 Model Splash Panels (Original Hood) - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 39 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the passenger side hood/fender splash panel (Item 1) in place on the inner fender and install the push-in fasteners (Item 2) attaching it to the hood/fender assembly (Item 3).
Repeat procedure to install the driver side hood/fender splash panel.
Install the passenger side splash guard panel hanger rod ( Item 1, Figure 41) into the rear bracket ( Item 3, Figure 41), then install it into the front bracket ( Item 2, Figure 41).
Hook the 3 springs ( Item 2, Figure 40) attaching the bottom of the splash guard panel ( Item 1, Figure 40) to the chassis.
Repeat procedure to install the driver side splash guard panel.

figure.caption: Figure 43. 2600 Aerodynamic Hood Splash Guard Panel (After March 1996)

Repeat procedure to remove the driver side splash guard panel.

figure.caption: Figure 44. 2600 Aerodynamic Hood Splash Guard Panel (After March 1996)

Install the passenger side splash guard panel hanger rod ( Item 1, Figure 44) into the rear bracket ( Item 3, Figure 44), then install it into the front bracket ( Item 2, Figure 44).
